short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A next level crypto wallet for Yona Network

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Yona Wallet Extension enables users to manage their testnet wallet within the Yona ecosystem. 

The Yona Wallet Extension allows users to either create new accounts on the Yona Network or import existing accounts using a recovery phrase.
